content: us #0/2 mm 16 inch/40 cm long circular needle * 1 us #2/2 75 mm 16 inch/40 cm long circular needle * us #2/2 75 mm needles for small circumference in the round **notions** * stitch markers * yarn needle **gauge** 28 sts/40 rounds = 4 inches/10 cm in stockinette stitch 27 sts/37 5 rounds = 4 inches/10 cm in pattern stitch
